entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:31 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
